Package pl.polsl.lab1.kacper.sikorski.myfirstmvp.controller

Class FightController

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.lab1.kacper.sikorski.myfirstmvp.controller.FightController
public class FightController extends Object
Handles the combat mechanics between the player and enemies.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kacper Sikorski

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    FightController(GameWindow gameWindow)
    Constructor to initialize the FightController with necessary components.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    startFight(Player player)
    Starts a fight between the player and a randomly spawned enemy.

  • Constructor Details

    • FightController

      public FightController(GameWindow gameWindow)
      Constructor to initialize the FightController with necessary components. It sets up the view for displaying the fight and initializes the random generator and enemy spawner.
      Parameters:
      gameWindow - The GameWindow for displaying and handling interactions.

  • Method Details

    • startFight

      public void startFight(Player player)
      Starts a fight between the player and a randomly spawned enemy. Updates the GUI with the enemy's name and health, and continues the fight until either the player or the enemy is defeated.
      Parameters:
      player - The player participating in the fight.
